events.message: We have received John's application for the software engineer position in our backend team.
The application has been categorized under Engineering, specifically for the software engineer role.
Recruiter Emma has been assigned to manage John's candidacy for the software engineer opening.
Initial screening completed; John shows strong experience in software development and relevant technologies.
John replied promptly and expressed enthusiasm in proceeding to the next technical interview stage.
Technical interview has been scheduled with John for April 17th to evaluate his software engineering skills.
John performed well during the technical interview, demonstrating proficiency in coding and system design.
The HR interview has been set up for John, aiming to discuss cultural fit and compensation expectations.
HR interview concluded successfully; John aligns well with company values and salary requirements.
An offer has been proposed to John, including details about position, salary, and benefits.
John provided positive feedback on the offer and has shown intent to accept the position.
John officially accepted the offer to join the company as a software engineer.
John started the onboarding process and has begun completing training modules and paperwork.
The hiring process for John has been successfully closed; he is now a full member of the engineering team.
